readable.title: 3142055158_01b9e4caa4
readable.content: A man playing rugby has the ball and tries to evade a tackler . A man runs on a field with the ball and a man in a striped shirt is on the ground . a man wearing red socks playing running with some other men One rugby player attempts to take down another . While holding tight to the ball , the man in red socks is getting tackled .
